allow:
Bash(bash -c '
APP_DIR=$\(cd ""$\(dirname ""./publish.sh""\)"" && pwd\)
echo ""App Dir: $APP_DIR""
cd ""$APP_DIR""
if [[ ! -f .env ]]; then
    echo ""ERROR: .env not found""
    exit 1
fi
echo ""✓ .env exists""
if [[ ! -d .git ]]; then
    echo ""ERROR: Not a git repo""
    exit 1
fi
echo ""✓ Git repo exists""
CURRENT_BRANCH=$\(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD\)
echo ""Current branch: $CURRENT_BRANCH""
')

Bash(bash -c '
set -u
source .env 2>/dev/null || true
PROD_SSH_USER=""${PROD_SSH_USER:-$\(grep ""^PROD_SSH_USER="" .env 2>/dev/null | cut -d""="" -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" || echo ""alsar4210""\)}""
echo ""PROD_SSH_USER=$PROD_SSH_USER""
')

Bash(bash -c '
set -eo pipefail
DRY_RUN=true
set -u

APP_DIR=""$\(cd ""$\(dirname ""/Users/aldoyh/Sites/RAMADAN/alsaryatv/publish.sh""\)"" && pwd\)""
cd ""$APP_DIR"" || {
    echo ""ERROR: Failed to change to app directory""
    exit 1
}

info\(\) { echo ""[INFO] $*""; }

info ""Loading env config...""
load_env_config\(\) {
    local env_file="".env""
    if [[ ! -f ""$env_file"" ]]; then
        echo ""ERROR: .env file not found""
        exit 1
    fi
    PROD_SSH_USER=""${PROD_SSH_USER:-$\(grep ""^PROD_SSH_USER="" ""$env_file"" 2>/dev/null | cut -d""="" -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" || echo ""alsar4210""\)}""
    echo ""PROD_SSH_USER=$PROD_SSH_USER""
}

load_env_config

info ""All done""
')

Bash(bash -c '
set -u
APP_DIR="".""
cd ""$APP_DIR""
PROD_SSH_USER=""""
PROD_SSH_HOST=""""

load_env_config\(\) {
    local env_file="".env""
    if [[ ! -f ""$env_file"" ]]; then
        echo ""ERROR: .env not found""
        exit 1
    fi
    PROD_SSH_USER=""${PROD_SSH_USER:-$\(grep ""^PROD_SSH_USER="" ""$env_file"" 2>/dev/null | cut -d""="" -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" || echo ""alsar4210""\)}""
    echo ""Got PROD_SSH_USER=$PROD_SSH_USER""
}

echo ""About to call load_env_config""
load_env_config
echo ""Done""
')

Bash(bash -c '
set -u
APP_DIR="".""
cd ""$APP_DIR""
PROD_SSH_USER=""""

load_env_config\(\) {
    local env_file="".env""
    if test ! -f ""$env_file""; then
        echo ""ERROR: .env not found""
        exit 1
    fi
    echo ""File exists""
}

load_env_config
')
